home.introduction: Hello, We are Thai Student Association in the Republic of Korea

hero.maintext:
TSAK serves as a central organization for public relations, supports, and activities for Thai students throughout the Republic of Korea.
The mission is to promote the exchange of knowledge and perspectives, and to foster unity and solidarity among Thai students.
The Association also acts as an official liaison with the Royal Thai Embassy and external organizations, while providing guidance, consultation, and assistance to Thai students across all regions of the Republic of Korea.

memberRegister.description: Thai students in the following categories are eligible to register as TSAK members:

degreeProgram.title: Degree Program Student
degreeProgram.description: Students pursuing a Bachelor's, Master's, or Doctoral degree

koreanLanguageProgram.title: Korean Language Program Student
koreanLanguageProgram.description: Students studying Korean at language institutes

shortTermExchange.title: Short-term Exchange Student
shortTermExchange.description: Students participating in exchange programs at Korean universities

researchAffiliation.title: Research Student
researchAffiliation.description: Students conducting research at educational institutions or research centers in Korea
